text: (upbeat music)
- [Presenter] AWS Industry customers

around the world are
revolutionizing every part
of life as we know it.

From quicker vaccine
development in healthcare
and autonomous driving in automotive,
to enabling safer financial transactions

within financial services
or cloud native 5G networks

and telecom empowering remote
content creation experiences
in media and entertainment.
AWS meets customers where they are

on their technology
journey, working backwards

from their specific
challenges and opportunities

to understand the unique
needs of each industry.

That's why AWS is dedicated to
an industry-focused approach
for customers.

Backed by over 15 years of
industry cloud expertise

and a dedicated team of
industry leading experts,
AWS offers insights and best practices

to help customers solve their
biggest industry challenges.

Customers of any size can
access AWS purpose-built
industry services and solutions

so they can leverage
products proven by customers

who have gone before them
to provide value faster
and increase ease of use.
Supported by the largest partner network,
including industry partner competencies.

AWS gives customers more choices
for finding the right fit

at all stages of their cloud
transformation journeys
to accelerate innovation.

And AWS is constantly engaged
in industry communities,

incorporating customer
feedback and refining

strategy to give customers
more opportunities

to pick the approach that
works best for their business.

At AWS, customer obsession
means industry obsession.

Learn more about how
AWS is helping customers
transform businesses and entire industries
at aws.com/industries.
